titles.title: A resolution to provide for related procedures concerning the article of impeachment against Donald John Trump, former President of the United States.
A resolution to provide for related procedures concerning the article of impeachment against Donald John Trump, former President of the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 11. Record Vote Number: 56.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: This resolution establishes procedures for conducting the impeachment trial of former President Donald Trump. These procedures include (1) filing requirements and deadlines, (2) time allotments for arguments and presentations in support of and against the article of impeachment, (3) admission of evidence, and (4) voting on the article of impeachment.
